content.rendered:
Directed by Andy Fetscher

Written by Andy Fetscher

Star Adolfo Assor(Reincke). Louie Betton(Alex). Gerhard Bös(The Old Man). Paul Faßnacht(Aike). Melika Foroutan(Ella). Daniela Galbo(Lisa Askonek). Eveline Hall(White Haired Woman). Maxine Kazis(Sanna). Otto Emil Koch(Noah). Stephan Luca(Lukas). Richard Manualpillai(Malick). Bianca Nawrath(Laura Wagner). Marcin Rogozinski(Icy Eyes). Marvin Schulze(Pfleger Rüdiger). Anna Unterberger(Kim)

Language German

Producers Benjamin Munz. Florian Schneider

Production Arbor Films .Constantin Television .Polish Film Institute
